name: PopCraft: Seamless Text Popovers in WordPress
author: chinteshprajapati

sections.description:
Elevate your WordPress editing experience with the Text Popover plugin, designed to seamlessly integrate with various blocks featuring toolbars such as paragraph blocks, heading blocks, and more. Enjoy the flexibility of adding popover content to selected text, enhancing your content creation process.

Special Features

  • Effortlessly add popovers to selected text within WordPress blocks.

Feedback

  • Your input is invaluable! I welcome your suggestions and feedback as we strive to enhance your user experience. Thank you for choosing and exploring my plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire Text Popover folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or higher

Manual Installation

  1. Unzip the files and upload the folder into your plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins/) overwriting older versions if they exist
  2. Activate the plugin in your WordPress admin area.
sections.faq:
In which WordPress version this Plugin is compatible?

It is compatible with 5.0 to the latest WordPress version.

What does the Text Popover plugin offer?

The Text Popover plugin allows you to add popover content to selected text within WordPress blocks, expanding your creative possibilities.
